entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends I thought what was breaking our system was your $1 Trillion tax cut to millionaires, the largest deficits in U. S. history under your administration, and now your bungled response to the COVID-19 pandemic that has resulted in 127,000 U.S. deaths and economic chaos? MAGA Sir?
